titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 11-aminoundecanoic acid (monomer 11).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/25/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2008, of the duty on 11-aminoundecanoic acid (monomer 11).
